name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-oriented Senior Engineer with 8 years of experience in software and systems engineering focused on technical inspections, maintenance, and problem-solving within complex environments. Adept at collaborating in team settings, demonstrating strong communication skills and adaptability to changing project requirements.

I possess hands-on expertise in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, leveraging **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** to build high-performance solutions tailored for the healthcare and financial sectors. My cloud proficiency encompasses **Azure** and **AWS**, ensuring efficient and scalable application deployment.

In addition, I have a strong foundation in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation to develop robust applications adhering to compliance standards. I also bring experience in machine learning pipelines, serving ML models in production, and implementing MLOps workflows using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
